item.title: [PI QUESTION] plz help me [PI QUESTION]
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

I need some help on how to change the items in the pest control shop :S and set a price on it, bacause when i try to add a new item in the shop, like claws, it dont get a price :S so…? what i have to do?

umm… guys, when i go in shopassistant.java or what its named, i seacrh on the item (id: 10551) i wanna change price on and find this:

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { switch (id) { case 10551: return 20; case 11664: return 20; case 11663: return 20; case 11665: return 20; case 10548: return 20; case 8842: return 20; case 8840: case 8839: return 40; case 6570: return 60; case 1044: case 1042: case 1040: case 1038: case 1046: case 1048: case 1050: case 1053: case 1055: case 1057: return 200; case 11696: return 170; case 11698: return 150; case 11700: return 150; case 2528: return 200; case 11730: return 100; case 15001: return 160; case 11720: return 80; case 6199: return 100; case 4671: return 250; case 3062: return 150; case 11722: return 60; case 18349: case 18351: case 18353: case 18355: case 18357: case 18359: return 1000; case 11718: return 40; case 11726: return 80; case 11724: return 100; case 13899: return 200; case 13902: return 160; case 13738: return 240; case 13740: case 13742: return 220; case 13744: return 180; case 11283: return 120; case 15018: case 15019: case 15020: return 40; case 6914: case 6989: case 6924: case 6922: case 6920: case 6918: case 6916: case 6889: return 250; case 15220: return 80; case 13736: return 80; case 13734: return 60; } return 0; }

where on this im gonna change the price?
